description: Named for the Norse goddess of death who rules over Helheim, the realm of the dishonored dead. This black potion with skull patterns grants dominion over the undead. For 1 hour, you can command undead as if you created them, and they treat you as their master. Hel, daughter of Loki, was said to have a body half-living and half-corpse.
effect: A creature takes 3d6 poison damage on a failed CON save.
name: Essence of Hel
